contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1930 D Tamworth Contest
Tamworth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Tamworth Contest tamworth-contest
Recollections of Schubert [arr. Rimmer]
Castle Grounds, Tamworth, Staffordshire
Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £4. 1st annual contest promoted by Tamworth Band of Hope Union. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2013, 11:42 a.m. Dec. 6, 2018, 4:18 p.m.
1 Amington Band Roland Davis
2 Metropolitan Works (Birmingham) Isaac Perrin
3 Whitwell British Legion J. A. Smith
4 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Unknown
5 Staffordshire Band Unknown
